name: Hungry Macrophage
description:
A macrophage must eat all the bacteria before the body is overrun with sickness. It can change the shape of its body to effectively navigate tight areas with poison.

Controls

  • arrow keys to move
  • mouse click-drag on cellular-membrane-nodes to morph shape

One of my first programming projects. Written on the web using p5.js, a simple boids implementation, and because I didn't know any linear algebra at the time, some inequality algebra to do the collision tests.
